changeSet.author: Suma
changeSet.comment: Blank out SUPPRESS_REJECT_REASON_CODES_ON_EIRT_APPROVAL parameter value which has a bad value.

update.where: NMSPC_CD='KFS-PURAP' AND PARM_NM='SUPPRESS_REJECT_REASON_CODES_ON_EIRT_APPROVAL' AND PARM_DTL_TYP_CD='ElectronicInvoiceReject' AND APPL_NMSPC_CD='KFS'
